meta_resource.description: Allows you to call a new timeline in the End of Time. Once called, you can Dive into it and partially merge with your self in the new timeline.
meta_resource.strategy_tip: Aetagest are collected by reaching goal states in existing timelines.
meta_resource.internal_notes: Combines the Latin word for age/lifetime, aetas, with the German word for adventure.

meta_resource.description: Complete extra-challenging paths to goals in timelines to accumulate this resource in The End Of Time.
meta_resource.strategy_tip: What this is used for is mysterious for now.
